2:
ByteEpic Pioneers a New Era in Financial Technology

1.Leading Technological Innovation

Artificial Intelligence and Big Data: 
ByteEpic will heavily invest in artificial intelligence and big data technologies to enhance the precision and intelligence level of trading strategies, ensuring a leading position in technological competition.

Blockchain Technology Applications: 
Exploring the use of blockchain technology in financial transactions to enhance transparency and security, driving industry technological advancement.

2.Global International Market Strategic Plan

Optimized Regional Layout: 
Further expanding market share in North America, Europe, and Asia to ensure balanced global business development.

Localization Strategy: 
Adhering to market demands in various countries and regions, developing localized trading strategies and service solutions, launching more intelligent and personalized strategy services, and providing users with precise strategy recommendations and asset allocations.

3.Fair and Transparent Allocation Mechanism

Transparent Income Distribution:
ByteEpic commits to maintaining high transparency in income distribution, regularly disclosing fair quotas and distribution rules to users, ensuring market quota openness and fairness.

Performance-Based Incentive Mechanism:
Introducing a dynamic quota adjustment mechanism based on user trading performance to encourage outstanding users and teams, as well as actively developing personnel, prioritizing higher income quotas.

Long-term Multilevel Incentive Policies:
Establishing multilevel reward plans, including annual bonuses, special contribution awards, venture capital, educational funds, and family life support policies to stimulate overall user and team motivation and creativity.

4.Sustainable Development and Social Responsibility

ByteEpic Strategy Company commits to actively promoting sustainable development and corporate social responsibility practices in business operations, reducing environmental footprint through innovation and green technology, contributing more value to society, creating long-term value and stable returns for users, and setting new benchmarks for the industry.

5.User Experience and Support:

Strengthening user relationship management and support teams to enhance user interaction experience and problem-solving capabilities.
Launching new user education and training programs to help users better understand and utilize the services and tools provided by the strategy company.

ByteEpic remains committed to achieving innovation and success in the field of intelligent trading, providing excellent services and solutions for global users and financial institutions. ByteEpic looks forward to achieving long-term growth and sustainable development through these strategic initiatives.

ByteEpic Grid Level Optimization Announcement

ByteEpic is further optimizing its grid levels to meet the growing trading demands and user expectations. As a leading trading platform in the industry, ByteEpic is committed to providing users with better services and more trading opportunities. This optimization aims to provide our users with wider market participation opportunities while strengthening ByteEpic's competitive advantage in the cryptocurrency market.

Grid Level Optimization Details:
Grid Level 1
Return Rate: 2.02% - 2.52%
Participation Amount: 50 - 1500 USDT
Grid Level 2
Return Rate: 2.52% - 3.3%
Participation Amount: 500 - 3500 USDT

Effective Date: August 1, 2024

Highlights of Grid Level Optimization:
The grid level optimization will bring higher trading amount limits, exclusive customer service, and more advanced trading experiences, catering to the investment needs of high-net-worth users and contributing to higher investment returns.

Future Outlook:
ByteEpic will continue to be committed to providing users with the best services and the most advanced trading tools. We believe that the optimization of grid levels will further enhance the user's investment experience and satisfaction. Thank you for your trust and support in ByteEpic, and we look forward to creating a brighter future together.

ByteEpic Team
Date: July 28, 2024
7:
Announcement: 

ByteEpic Market Department Market Purification Completion

To maintain the market order of ByteEpic Strategy Company, ensure the interests of all users and the long-term stable development of the platform, and strive to provide a fair and just trading environment for every user, any violation and improper behavior is not allowed to affect the platform's order.

As of July 9, 2024, the ByteEpic Market Department has completely purged and terminated non-compliant users, returning their principal and a portion of their profits. Users engaging in violations and unqualified users have been terminated to ensure the normal trading and returns of other users are not affected. Through this market purification, we can improve the overall service quality of the platform, make strategy services more effectively meet the needs of compliant users, maintain a healthy market development, and protect the interests of all users.

The market purification, optimization of resource allocation, and termination of unqualified and violating users have been completely concluded. ByteEpic Strategy Company is committed to building a safe, fair, and transparent trading platform. 

Thank you for your understanding and support! We believe that through these market purification measures, the platform will develop more healthily and steadily, creating more value for global users.

ByteEpic Team
Date: 9 July 2024

12:
ByteEpic Commitment Statement

ByteEpic is committed to creating greater value for users and continuously enhancing the platform's competitiveness. To achieve this, we have made several optimizations to the platform and promise to provide our users with fairer, more transparent, and convenient services.

We Respect Your Choices:
Freedom to Develop: You are not obligated to create a team or recommend new users. You are free to choose your own development path and enjoy the freedom to work. Even if you are inactive for a long period, ByteEpic will permanently guarantee your basic market profit income.
Financial Security: We have removed the unilateral dismissal and elimination policy. Your profits and invested capital can be withdrawn freely, ensuring the safety and compliance of your funds.

We Reward Your Contributions:
Fair Income: We have enhanced the fairness of strategy trading profits, prioritizing users with active participation, team engagement, and dedicated contributions with preferential market share profit allocation, to enhance the profit returns of outstanding contributors.

Level Advancement: Users who meet the requirements for level advancement can enjoy stable and permanent level income benefits, ensuring the security of user level profit rights.
Continuous Development Rewards: Users who continuously develop 2 direct referrals each month will enjoy a long-term and stable maximum market profit of 1.8% - 4.3% for the grid level. Users who have no active referrals for 50 consecutive days will still enjoy a minimum market profit of 0.8% - 3.5%, and users are free to withdraw the profits they earn.

High-Level Promotion Eligibility: Users who reach 35 direct referrals and 120 level 2 and level 3 referrals will be included in formal positions, unaffected by any policies or market share restrictions. They will permanently enjoy the highest market profit income, be prioritized for ByteEpic job promotions, receive additional living benefits and salary benefits, participate in high-level regional leadership meetings, and have voting rights in these meetings.
We Are Dedicated to Refining Our Platform:
Grid Income Guarantee: Grid 3 - Grid 6 market share is based on quota ranking. Users who meet Grid 3- Grid 6 requirements can enjoy the highest profit income within the grid. Continuously active users in Grid 3 - Grid 6 will permanently enjoy the income of Grid 3 - Grid 6, not limited by quota ranking.

Agent Privilege: Users who meet the requirements for agency will enjoy preferential grid income, market share, and profits, and will have priority access to relevant platform activities.

ByteEpic is full of opportunities and challenges, but we are confident that through the collective efforts of the entire ByteEpic team, we will be able to achieve these development goals, continuously enhance the company's core competitiveness, and strengthen our market position. 

We appreciate the support and trust of every user and partner. Let us work together to create a brighter future for ByteEpic.

14:
Announcement

To further enhance the user trading experience and yield levels, ByteEpic is providing more efficient and stable trading strategies for qualified users, ensuring that every user can fully enjoy the pleasure and rewards of profit.

Trading Yield Optimization Plan
Strategy Upgrade: We have comprehensively upgraded our existing trading strategies, incorporating the latest market data and advanced algorithm models, further enhancing the accuracy and yield of our strategies. The new strategies have performed excellently under various market conditions, effectively capturing market opportunities and generating higher returns for users. Meanwhile, our risk management team will monitor market dynamics in real-time, and actively developing teams and individuals will be prioritized for market trading rights and yield benefits.

Qualified Yield Rights: Based on user account holding duration, trading activity, and team member activity history, only qualified users will have their yield rights permanently guaranteed.

Disqualified Yield: For individuals who have consistently failed to meet development ideals and teams with overall inactivity, we will return their initial capital. Market profits and trading yield rights will be revoked. These rights will be prioritized for allocation to active, high-performing teams and individuals who consistently align with our development ideals.

ByteEpic's Commitment
ByteEpic is committed to providing users with better investment services and continuously optimizing trading strategies and risk management systems to ensure the platform's healthy and sustainable development. To this end, we will terminate users who consistently fail to meet development standards.
Thank you for your continued support.

ByteEpic Team
Date: July 8, 2024
15:
BlackRock CEO Larry Fink: Cryptocurrencies Are the Path to Freedom

BlackRock CEO Larry Fink recently expressed a shift in his attitude toward Bitcoin in public remarks, no longer considering it a “money laundering index,” but acknowledging it as an investment opportunity free from government control.

Fink's shift is closely related to BlackRock's recent launch of its Bitcoin ETF product. This product has attracted substantial capital inflows, leading to record highs for BlackRock's asset management size.

Fink now considers Bitcoin a “legitimate financial tool” that provides uncorrelated returns and allows investors greater financial autonomy outside of traditional financial systems. He believes Bitcoin should be part of any portfolio, and also has promising industrial applications.

The success of BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF, along with increasing interest in cryptocurrencies from other institutional investors, signals the growing mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies within traditional financial markets.

Fink's shift and BlackRock's success in the Bitcoin space suggests that Bitcoin, as an emerging asset class, will play a significant role in future asset allocation.
